alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward County through 715 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lauderhill, or over Tamarac, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Coral Springs, Pompano Beach, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Coconut Creek, Oakland Park, North Lauderdale, Lauderdale Lakes, Cooper City, Broadview-Pompano Park, St. George, Chambers Estates, Pine Island Ridge, Village Park and Broadview Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
